title: 15 Best Patterned Sheets Packed With Personality (2025)
description: These bedding sets double as decor
author: Shoko Wanger
excerpt: These are the best patterned sheets to fit any design style. Find our favorites in a variety of prints and breathable materials like percale and linen
text: More AD-Approved Patterned SheetsBoll & Branch Signature Hemmed Sheet SetOur pick for best sateen sheets, this Boll & Branch set showcases the material’s many hallmarks—it’s smooth, silky, and wrinkle-resistant (plus, commerce director Rachel Fletcher calls them “some of the softest sheets I’ve ever tried”)—alongside a slew of sophisticated extras: organic, long-staple cotton construction, a choice of eight elegant patterns, and a pleasing, polished sheen.Sijo AiryWeight Tencel Sheet SetMade from sustainable eucalyptus fibers, these striped lyocell sheets are cooling, moisture-wicking, and certified asthma- and allergy-friendly, making them ideal for sensitive systems. Can’t get enough? Supplement your set with the brand’s eucalyptus comforter and pillow while you’re at it.West Elm Pierce & Ward Deco Diamond Sheet SetWest Elm has long been a go-to for designer collaborations. Their latest, with interior experts Pierce & Ward, includes this deco-inspired sheet set, made of 200-thread-count cotton in a cooler-than-cool diamond print.Sarah Sherman Samuel Tiger Hemp Sheet SetThe brainchild of AD100 designer Sarah Sherman Samuel, this vintage-inspired sheet set offers an elevated take on animal print. Made from 100% hemp, it’s made with sustainability and durability in mind and a sweet backstory to boot: Its tiger motif was based on a drawing by Samuel’s son.The Company Store Ellary Classic Cool Cotton Percale Bed Sheet SetThis block-print-inspired cotton sheet set embodies the breeziness of summer. Made of 200-thread-count cotton percale, it’s light, bright, and made for layering (the brand offers shams and a patchwork quilt that combines all three of the collection’s prints to match).Brooklinen Washed European Linen Hardcore BundleWe named these the best sheets in our most recent linen roundup thanks to its versatility, garment-washed softness, and temperature-regulating abilities. “Think of your favorite linen shirt, but in the form of a sheet,” says contributor Yelena Moroz Alpert. This particularly robust—and cost-effective—bundle offers the option of customizing a full set, complete with a duvet cover and cotton blanket. Available in full size to California king, sheets come in your choice of solids or multi-hued stripes.Greenrow Small Gingham Sheet Set & ShamsCan’t resist a cute detail? Sustainable homewares brand Greenrow has the best sheets for you. Thoughtful touches and elegant embellishments include ruffles, embroidery, colorful piping, and crocheted trim. We’re partial to this garment-dyed, organic cotton set, featuring navy blue gingham and pillowcases with ribbon closures.Schoolhouse Dot Percale Sheet SetPolka dots aren’t solely for the pint-sized among us. A collaboration between Schoolhouse and beloved Portland letterpress studio Egg Press, this crisp cotton percale sheet set exudes lighthearted sophistication with a hand-painted print, hand-stitched label, and cheerful pop of bright-red color.Urban Outfitters Porto Tile Patterned Sheet SetFor those looking for an out-of-the-box print, Urban Outfitters has them stocked in spades. From bows to blueberries, delft-inspired cats to this illustrated tile motif, these patterned sheets mix vibrant color and a sense of play that appeal to decor enthusiasts of all ages. (Accordingly, sets range from dorm-friendly twin XL to king size.)Garnet Hill Artful Supima Flannel Sheet SetGarnet Hill calls this set the “crème de la crème of flannel bedding,” and it’s easy to see why. Made from long-staple pima cotton, the floral-patterned set is intended to have the familiar warmth and comfy-cozy feel of flannel along with a host of elevated touches like hem-stitched detailing.
html:
More AD-Approved Patterned Sheets

Boll & Branch Signature Hemmed Sheet Set

Our pick for best sateen sheets, this Boll & Branch set showcases the material’s many hallmarks—it’s smooth, silky, and wrinkle-resistant (plus, commerce director Rachel Fletcher calls them “some of the softest sheets I’ve ever tried”)—alongside a slew of sophisticated extras: organic, long-staple cotton construction, a choice of eight elegant patterns, and a pleasing, polished sheen.

Sijo AiryWeight Tencel Sheet Set

Made from sustainable eucalyptus fibers, these striped lyocell sheets are cooling, moisture-wicking, and certified asthma- and allergy-friendly, making them ideal for sensitive systems. Can’t get enough? Supplement your set with the brand’s eucalyptus comforter and pillow while you’re at it.

West Elm Pierce & Ward Deco Diamond Sheet Set

West Elm has long been a go-to for designer collaborations. Their latest, with interior experts Pierce & Ward, includes this deco-inspired sheet set, made of 200-thread-count cotton in a cooler-than-cool diamond print.

Sarah Sherman Samuel Tiger Hemp Sheet Set

The brainchild of AD100 designer Sarah Sherman Samuel, this vintage-inspired sheet set offers an elevated take on animal print. Made from 100% hemp, it’s made with sustainability and durability in mind and a sweet backstory to boot: Its tiger motif was based on a drawing by Samuel’s son.

The Company Store Ellary Classic Cool Cotton Percale Bed Sheet Set

This block-print-inspired cotton sheet set embodies the breeziness of summer. Made of 200-thread-count cotton percale, it’s light, bright, and made for layering (the brand offers shams and a patchwork quilt that combines all three of the collection’s prints to match).

Brooklinen Washed European Linen Hardcore Bundle

We named these the best sheets in our most recent linen roundup thanks to its versatility, garment-washed softness, and temperature-regulating abilities. “Think of your favorite linen shirt, but in the form of a sheet,” says contributor Yelena Moroz Alpert. This particularly robust—and cost-effective—bundle offers the option of customizing a full set, complete with a duvet cover and cotton blanket. Available in full size to California king, sheets come in your choice of solids or multi-hued stripes.

Greenrow Small Gingham Sheet Set & Shams

Can’t resist a cute detail? Sustainable homewares brand Greenrow has the best sheets for you. Thoughtful touches and elegant embellishments include ruffles, embroidery, colorful piping, and crocheted trim. We’re partial to this garment-dyed, organic cotton set, featuring navy blue gingham and pillowcases with ribbon closures.

Schoolhouse Dot Percale Sheet Set

Polka dots aren’t solely for the pint-sized among us. A collaboration between Schoolhouse and beloved Portland letterpress studio Egg Press, this crisp cotton percale sheet set exudes lighthearted sophistication with a hand-painted print, hand-stitched label, and cheerful pop of bright-red color.

Urban Outfitters Porto Tile Patterned Sheet Set

For those looking for an out-of-the-box print, Urban Outfitters has them stocked in spades. From bows to blueberries, delft-inspired cats to this illustrated tile motif, these patterned sheets mix vibrant color and a sense of play that appeal to decor enthusiasts of all ages. (Accordingly, sets range from dorm-friendly twin XL to king size.)

Garnet Hill Artful Supima Flannel Sheet Set

Garnet Hill calls this set the “crème de la crème of flannel bedding,” and it’s easy to see why. Made from long-staple pima cotton, the floral-patterned set is intended to have the familiar warmth and comfy-cozy feel of flannel along with a host of elevated touches like hem-stitched detailing.
